Calculated empirical density.

This function calculate an empirical density based on variable split from Ceteris Paribus profiles.

CalculateEmpiricalDensity(cp, df, variable_split)

Arguments

cp

data.frame generated by ingredients::ceteris_paribus()
df

data.frame with raw data to model
variable_split

list generated by ingredients::calculate_variable_split()

Value

Return an empirical density based on ingredients::calculate_variable_split().

Examples

# NOT RUN {
split <- ingredients::calculate_variable_split(df, variables = colnames(df))
CalculateEmpiricalDensity(df, variable_split = split)
# }
